title.en: A collection of photographs of Merched y Wawr Henryd, Aberconwy
title.cy: Casgliad o luniau o gangen Merched y Wawr Henryd, Rhanbarth Aberconwy

description.en: Parti Nadolig cyntaf cangen Henryd - Rhagfyr 1968. Ceinwen Roberts, Winnie, Mary Hughes, Mrs Jackson, Mrs Pierce, Jane Jones, Dilys Jones, Glenys Roberts, Mererid Jones, Anwen Hughes, Laura Jones, Mrs Wayman, Mrs Roberts, Bella Jones, Mrs Owen, Jane Jones, Ann Edwards a C. Davies Sefydlydd y Gangen.
